title: What Changed Everything for Us
content: When we finally found safe, evidence-based ways to move again, everything shifted.
We rebuilt our cores. Our pelvic floors started to function much better. The heaviness lessened.
**And most importantly, we felt like ourselves again.** That's why we created She Moves.
To give every mum the chance to heal, rebuild, and feel confident without shame, pressure, overwhelm or "bounce-back" nonsense.
